content: PWH S CMT Sharp-point cement screws Exterior single cement board screw (kaitex duplex coating) for fastening cement boards to metal ### Categories: Home > Products > Fasteners > Screws- - - ### FEATURES:Features The screws can be driven quickly thanks to their optimized stitch point geometry Low contact pressure – for more comfortable, less tiring screwdriving Hilti has full control of the manufacturing process – delivering reliable, consistent quality Precisely matched to Hilti drivers and bits – helping to achieve high-quality fastenings every time All Hilti stitch-point screws meet or exceed ASTM C 1002 performance requirements Applications Fastening cement boards to metal studs (25-20 ga) Fastening exterior sheathing boards to metal studs (25-20 ga) ### TECHNICAL DATA: Screw head type: Wafer head Screw drive/recess type: PH #2 Collated: No Technical Data | Screw head type | Wafer head | Screw drive/recess type | PH #2 | Collated | No | Product Class | Standard | Drilling capacity - min (ga) | 25 ga | Environmental Conditions | Dry indoor, Indoor environments with temporary condensation, Outdoor, rural or urban environment with low pollution ### ITEMS- 372757 - Cement brd screw 8 x 1-1/4 PW Hi-Lo S - Package Size 5000 pc
